name: WEAR YOUR EGO LIKE A LOOSE-FITTING GARMENT
description:
A series of collages based on our search for perfection in the human form. From photo filters to diets, to cosmetic surgery, is there anything off-limits?
As we preen and pluck away at our flesh, we lose pieces of ourselves in the process while circling around for our next fix.
WEAR YOUR EGO LIKE A LOOSE-FITTING GARMENT, a visual representation of the lengths we will go to in order to have that “perfect” body.
Collage by @dehiscenceart from "Skin We Live In Series"
Animation & Audio by @Helldreamer00
Mp4 39.9 MB, 32 sec loop with audio.
